thread.title: BRIEF-Concord Medical Services Says Co Welcomes Investment Led By China International Capital​

title: BRIEF-Concord Medical Services Says Co Welcomes Investment Led By China International Capital​

organizations.name: brief-concord medical services says co welcomes inv
brief-concord medical services says co welcomes investment led by china international capital​ april

text:
April 3, 2018 / 10:26 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Concord Medical Services Says Co Welcomes Investment Led By China International Capital​ Reuters Staff 
April 3 (Reuters) - Concord Medical Services Holdings Ltd : 
* SAYS CO WELCOMES INVESTMENT LED BY CHINA INTERNATIONAL CAPITAL CORPORATION LIMITED​ 
* ‍TOTAL INVESTMENT WILL BE RMB 1.5 TO 1.8 BILLION​ Source text for Eikon:
